xal.extension.solver.market

Class RandomAlgorithmStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.extension.solver.market.AlgorithmStrategy
      • xal.extension.solver.market.RandomAlgorithmStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AlgorithmPoolListener, AlgorithmScheduleListener, SolutionJudgeListener

    public class RandomAlgorithmStrategy
extends AlgorithmStrategy
    RandomAlgorithmStrategy is a subclass of algorithm strategy and selects a random algorithm strategy.
